name: Light Again
description:
Become a Hero - Save the world from darkness!

While running through the forest, you will face resistance from owlmen. They enjoy 24/7 moonlight and they intend to keep it that way.

Collect moondust to charge up a powerful blast - Moon Shot!

Enjoyable on any PC.

PC Controls:

  • Arrows or WASD - Movement
  • Space - Shoot
  • Enter - Moon Shot
  • P - Pause Game
